I do lot of night travelling and that's the one feature i want a bike to have. I will not put on Aux lights. They don't help. They just blind the oncoming vehicles. 
Its nice to see that MT15 punches above its weight and competes with 200cc. That engine is amazing. 
RTR 200 is an all round package with just that 1 aspect to compromise on. The bike not having 6th gear.
